wikitext.*:
'''George William Tolkien''' (1805 – 1877) was the oldest of eleven children of [[George Tolkien]] (1784 - 1840) and [[Eliza Lydia Murrell]] (1787 - 1863). His younger brother, [[John Benjamin Tolkien]] (1807 – 1896), the second oldest of the siblings, was the grandfather of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. In many sources George William's father George is referred as "George William Tolkien", but according to the documents where his name appears, this is an error.<ref>{{webcite|author=galadhorn|articleurl=http://tolkniety.blogspot.com/2018/01/george-tolkien-178418-not-george-william.html|articlename=George Tolkien (1784–1840) – not George William!|dated=7.1.2018|website=[http://tolkniety.blogspot.com/ Tolknięty]|accessed=20 November 2019}} – on George Tolkien's children, see galadhorn's comment (18.2.2018) to the article.</ref>
